question: Which state has bagged the ‘Swachh Sarvekshan Grameen-2019’ award?
explanation: Telangana has bagged the ‘Swachh Sarvekshan Grameen-2019’ award that Minister for Panchayat Raj and Rural Development Errabelli Dayakar Rao received from Union Minister for Chemicals and Fertilizers at a function held in New Delhi. Sanitation in the rural areas has greatly improved with constant efforts of the State government. It was possible only with the initiative of officials and elected representatives, including sarpanches.
